product_name: California North Coast Bicycle Touring Map
long_description: A colorfully illustrated map, to guide you along the rugged coastline of Northern California from San Francisco to the Oregon Boarder. Folds out to 36 x 17 inches; elevation gain graphs. Krebs Cycle Products; copyright 1995. Features both road and off road routes; each area profiled has suggested routes which include direction of travel and elevation gain. Many notes of local points of interest and amenities have been added to the maps margins.
short_description: A colorfully illustrated map, to guide you along the rugged coastline of Northern California from San Francisco to the Oregon Boarder.
